jams.name: ALT CTRL Game Jam
jams.description: ALT CTRL Game Jam is about experimenting with controls for your game. Make your custom controllers, or use conventional ones in a different way. This is an online jam with optional real world gatherings.

jams.name: Ludum Dare 33
jams.description: Choose between a solo 48 hour game compo or a 72 hour jam.
